ie.dit.comp.student

Class StudentRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.dit.comp.student.Student
      • ie.dit.comp.student.StudentRecord

  • public class StudentRecord
extends Student
    Student Record where a current year can be specified. Extends Student and implements Tellable (since this is implemented at a higher level)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ie.dit.comp.student.Student

        name, studentNo, surname
